mapper.sql: SELECT t.id id, t.order_no orderNo, t.trade_time tradeTime, t.accounting_no accountingNo, t.accounting_time accountingTime, t.recharge_way rechargeWay, t.amount amount, t.cust_id custId, t.acc_no accNo, t.acc_name accName, t.user_name userName, t.to_cust_id toCustId, t.to_acc_no toAccNo, t.to_acc_name toAccName, t.to_user_name toUserName, t.contract_no contractNo, t.item_no itemNo, t.remark remark, t.status status, t.trade_type tradeType, t.accounting_status accountingStatus, t.accounting_result accountingResult, t.abnormal_state abnormalState, t.create_time createTime, t.modify_time modifyTime FROM t_gq_fss_check_accounting t
mapper.select:
AND t.`order_no` like CONCAT('%',#{orderNo},'%')
AND t.`trade_type` like CONCAT('%',#{type},'%')
AND t.`contract_no` like CONCAT('%',#{contractNo},'%')
and t.user_name like concat('%',#{username},'%')
and t.abnormal_state like concat('%',#{abnormalState},'%')
and t.acc_name like concat('%',#{accName},'%')
and t.trade_time >= #{startTime}
and t.trade_time <= #{endTime}
ORDER BY t.trade_time DESC
WHERE t.trade_type IN (10980001,10980003) AND t.`accounting_status`=98010002 ORDER BY t.create_time DESC
